unnormalised: Arre yaar, SBI charged me Rs. 250 for not maintaining min balance! Gotta keep atleast ₹3000 in the a/c, warna they cut money like crazy.
normalised: Arre yaar, S-B-I charged me rupee two hundred and fifty for not maintaining minimum balance! Gotta keep at least rupee three thousand in the account, वरना they cut money like crazy.
